text: Larry Dixon (August 31, 1942 â€“ December 4, 2020) was an American Republican politician. He was a member of the Alabama Senate from 1983 to 2011. He was a member of the Alabama House of Representatives from 1978 through 1982. Dixon was born in Nowata, Oklahoma. Dixon died on December 4, 2020 in Montgomery, Alabama at the age of 78.Former Alabama state Sen. title: Larry Dixon (politician)
